title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
EB: You should be able to successfully create the JAR without the error message.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Edit a file without saving it. 2. Open the JAR packager for the project. 3. Enter all necessary information such as path, destination, and name of the JAR packager. 4. Press the finish button.
